pages.text: Storm release is the kekki genkai of lightning and water release, and currently contains 2 jutsu

pages.title: Thunder cloud void wave
pages.text: Upon use of this jutsu the user will surround themselves with storm clouds, dealing damage to any mobs nearby.$(br) $(li)Max charge:1$(li)Chakra per second: aprox 15$(li)Jutsuxp needed:400

pages.title: laser circus
pages.text: Upon use of this jutsu the user will gather lightning before firing it in front of themselves, the duration of which scaled with how long it is charged.$(br) $(li)Max charge: Limitless$(li)Chakra taken: Limitless$(li)Jutsuxp needed:400
